## ConnectionChecker.getErrorMessage() method

Helper method that translates a connection error code into a string.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getErrorMessage(errorCode: number, a: Connection | null, b: Connection | null): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  errorCode | number | The error code. |
|  a | [Connection](./blockly.connection.md) \| null | One of the two connections being checked. |
|  b | [Connection](./blockly.connection.md) \| null | The second of the two connections being checked. |

**Returns:**

string

A developer-readable error string.
